channel.title: Projects on CSx
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on CSx

item.title: Fishing Lures
item.description: 2018 Pine 2x4, household lacquer, yellow acrylic painted eyes, and brass hardware (I was bored) Yet to test the wiggle pattern

item.title: Keyboard Modeling
item.description: 2016-2017 Started with Blender and finished with Fusion 360 (switches and stabilizers from Thingiverse?) Developed some RSI symptoms as I worked on this pathway

item.title: RPi4 Console (2021)
item.description: Pieced together: June 7, 2021 RPi4 = Raspberry Pi 4 I wanted a tiny console to check out ARM architecture stuff: Ubuntu/RPi4, and RetroPie/RPi4. This one does not include a parts list because this configuration (power delivery hat/addon) killed the official RPi4 LCD screen. I sold my RPi4 because of sketchy hats (addon boards). Next attempt will be something different.

item.title: Wrist Rests (2020)
item.description: Supplies delivered: March 3, 2020 I’ll try my best to keep these posts to the point and to not go crazy with the details. At the end of 2020 I stumbled in to some remote contract work. This job required the use of a keyboard, and a lot of typing. Instead of spending time and money on future RSI surgeries, I decided to get an urklenomic keyboard. The problem with the keyboard I bought (aside from the price tag) was that my wrists would go numb after four hours.
